title: Yevgeni Borisovich Yefremov
text:
Yevgeni Borisovich Yefremov (; born 30 June 1970) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> in 1988 for <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Naberezhnye%20Chelny">FC Torpedo Naberezhnye Chelny</a>. He played six games in the <a href="UEFA%20Intertoto%20Cup%201996">UEFA Intertoto Cup 1996</a> for <a href="FC%20KAMAZ-Chally%20Naberezhnye%20Chelny">FC KAMAZ-Chally Naberezhnye Chelny</a>.
